class decision_tree_regression.DecisionTreeNode(feature_index=None, threshold=None, left=None, right=None, value=None)[source]

Bases: object

Decision Tree Node

class decision_tree_regression.DecisionTreeRegressor(min_samples_split=2, max_depth=2)[source]

Bases: object

Base implementation of the regression using Decision Tree

fit(X, y)[source]

Trains the Decision Tree on the provided dataset.

Parameters: - X: Feature data for training. - y: Target values.

predict(X)[source]

Predicts values for the given data using the trained Decision Tree.

Parameters: - X: The feature data for prediction.

Returns: - An array of predicted values.

decision_tree_regression.plot_combined_regression_with_decision_tree(train_data, test_data, coefficients, m, q, tree_regressor)[source]

Plots the results of linear, polynomial and decision tree regressions on the training and test data.
